|brand = D-Link |model = DE-220P |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (T) D2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/09/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/D-Link_DE-220P_rev_D2 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = ISA |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = KA2APC260P0 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 8DE220PCT1D2 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |ethoui = 00:50:BA, 00:80:C8, 00:40:05
|chip1 = D-Link;DLT-2518; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|linuxdriv = ne |windriv =
|eth_ports = 1 |eth_speed = 10MbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = <!-- Support automdix --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Support Jumbo frames -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/03/1997 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|powledcolor = red, "РWR/Тх" |connactled = green, "LNК/Rх" |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Per one card... *The FCC ID of the card / the one on the card is '''KA2APC260PO''' • [https://www.rom.by/files/analogichnaya_karta_drugogo_proizvoditelya.jpg PCB rev D2] *"8DE220PCT1D2", the '''D-Link''' logo, and "DE-220P REV-D2" is silkscreened on the card :"P/N", "181025183760", "9932M", and "BK8702.2" is the text on the Ethernet controller *Per the card's MAC label, the device uses (at least) an 00:50:BA (''[[D-Link]]'') OUI
This device is almost assuredly using an NE2000 compatible chipset. {{See also|Linksys LNE2000|Netgear EA201 rev D2}}
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.rom.by/forum/ISA_Ethernet_Controller_P_N_181025183760_DLT-2518?page=5 ISA Ethernet Controller P/N 181025183760 (DLT-2518)] • [http://www.rom.by/files/isa_polnyy_analog.jpg PCB rev D1] :P/N 1810<u>2518</u>3760 - [[D-Link]] DLT-2518 (CS8900A), OUI: 00:80:C8 :EEPROM 93C56N (CS: 79 EECS, CLK: 82 EECK, DI: 81 EEDO, DO: 80 EEDI) <!-- :FСС ID: КА2АРС260РО, DF-220Р СТ RЕV-D2, 8DЕ220РСТ0D2 :P/N: 181025183760 9848М, ВH8233_1, ВООT RОМ, :ВNС: MYSОN MTD492N 9846 ER, Q 20.000 В m8 :TR: LB CFUS0509-C 9847, LB FB2022 9851, LВ ТA100-05В 9847 МY, :OUI: 0080С8 D940АЕ, S768СН2569, ЯU Р&Q 9845, МАDЕ IN СНINА :LED: "LNК/Rх" и "РWR/Тх", BNC: "IVX", 10Mbps, ВNС, RJ-45, D-Link --> *[http://bschepan.narod.ru/hwmuseum/isa_lan_cards.htm ISA Ethernet LAN Cards Collection] :[http://bschepan.narod.ru/hwmuseum/img/full/isa_lan/ISA_015_1.jpg D-Link DE-220E (CT) Rev B1] - DL2518 (KA2APC220E2) :[http://bschepan.narod.ru/hwmuseum/img/full/isa_lan/ISA_016_1.jpg D-Link DE-220E (T) Rev B1] - DL2518 (KA2APC220E3) :[http://bschepan.narod.ru/hwmuseum/img/full/isa_lan/ISA_017_1.jpg D-Link DE-220P (T) Rev D1] - DLT-2518 (KA2APC260P0) :Diamond 2500 - DLT-2518 (ISA), S3 Trio 775 - DLT-2518 (ISA) *Controller: [[Realtek]] [[:File:Z-Com WL2450 bt RTL8019AS.jpg|RTL8019AS]] - [http://bschepan.narod.ru/hwmuseum/img/full/isa_lan/ISA_001_1.jpg Planet ISA Card] - [http://bschepan.narod.ru/hwmuseum/img/full/isa_lan/ISA_002_1.jpg BC912] (100-pin) :RTL8029AS - 10 (PCI), RTL8139C - 10/100 (PCI), RTL8169SC - GbE (PCI)
==See also== *KA2APC220E1 (1995-11-30) - Ethernet Interface Card *KA2APC220E2 (1995-11-30) - Ethernet Interface Card *KA2APC220E3 (1995-11-09) - Ethernet Interface Card *KA2APC220P1 (1996-01-17) - Ethernet LAN Card *KA2APC220P2 (1996-03-05) - Ethernet Card *KA2APC220P3 (1996-03-05) - Ethernet Card *KA2APC220P4 (1996-07-10) - Ethernet Card *KA2APC220P6 (1996-07-16) - Ethernet LAN Card *KA2APC220S0 (1997-04-16) - Ethernet LAN Card *KA2APC220S1 (1997-04-16) - Ethernet LAN Card *KA2APC260P0 (1997-02-03) - D-Link DE-220P rev D2 + [https://www.rom.by/files/analogichnaya_karta_drugogo_proizvoditelya.jpg PCB T D2] • [https://30.img.avito.st/1280x960/4695029730.jpg PCB CT D2] *KA2APC500E1 (1998-08-31) - LAN Card *KA2APC500X1 (1996-01-18) - LAN Card *KA2APC500X2 (1996-09-12) - LAN Card *KA2APC500X3 (1997-06-06) - LAN Card *KA2APC530-1 (1996-06-05) - PCI LAN Card • [[D-Link DFE-530TX+ rev E1]] ? *KA2APC20001 (1995-12-05) - Ethernet Card • LB2000CT rev B1 • [https://www.rom.by/files/primer_analogichnoy_setevoy_karty.jpg PCB] *KA2APC20002 (1996-01-18) - LAN Card *KA2APC65001 (1996-05-06) - PCMCIA Ethernet Card and Adapters *KA2APC65002 (1996-05-03) - PCMCIA Ethernet Card *KA2APC65003 (1996-11-08) - PCMCIA Ethernet Card
